* Iron Raptor was a little short tempered at the moment and the fact that 
Histeria hadn't responded to her only made it a little worse. So, as she was 
always use to, she did it all herself.
At a console she called up a 3D picture of the CF and all the surrounding 
land, every signatire within the scann appearing as a red dot on the grid.
She looks over her shoulder-plate at Epyon as he walks into the room and 
sits down, half turning to him with a straight look.*

" Where were you?"

* She had every right to know, because it had taken him a while to get here 
after she had told Prowl to ask him to do so.
But just then Prowl caught her attention as he walked into the room, seeing 
him salute and nodded at him to be at ease.
She kept her attention on him as he spoke, lifting a brow and looking 
Firedrill over.
This new transformer could be of use, but she might have to meet the two 
others that Prowl spoke of. But her thoughts convayed something else all 
together.
< After that battle I trust no one outside of this faction. But, we'll see.>
She looked Firedrill over again.*

" Firedrill, what are your tallents?"
